title: General Tso's Tofu
subtitle: with Quinoa & Broccoli
description: Our General Tso's Tofu features crispy tofu cubes tossed in a sweet and spicy sauce, served with steamed broccoli and a bed of protein-rich quinoa. This plant-based take on the Chinese-American classic delivers bold flavors with a nutritious twist, balancing the perfect amount of heat with subtle sweetness and umami depth.

sustainability.sourcing:

Quinoa: Imported from South America
Broccoli: Local farm
sustainability.ingredients:

Quinoa: Moderate impact (imported)

title: Mediterranean Bowl
subtitle: with Falafel & Hummus
description: A Mediterranean Bowl is a vibrant, wholesome dish featuring a base of quinoa or couscous, topped with fresh veggies like cucumbers, tomatoes, and bell peppers. Topped with hummus, tzatziki, olives, feta, and fresh herbs, it can be finished with tofu. A drizzle of olive oil and a squeeze of lemon tie everything together, offering a perfect balance of refreshing flavors and textures.

title: Grilled Lettuce Wrap
subtitle: with Cottage Cheese & Wild Rice
description: Our Grilled Lettuce Wrap features fresh butter lettuce leaves filled with a savory mix of wild rice, creamy cottage cheese, and grilled vegetables. Each wrap is packed with vitamins and protein while keeping carbs low. The combination of crunchy lettuce, hearty rice, and rich cottage cheese creates a satisfying texture profile that's both refreshing and filling.

title: Buddha Bowl
subtitle: with Sweet Potato & Kale
description: Our Buddha Bowl is a nourishing composition of roasted sweet potatoes, massaged kale, chickpeas, and quinoa, artfully arranged to showcase vibrant colors and textures. Drizzled with a tahini-lemon dressing and topped with avocado, hemp seeds, and microgreens, this bowl delivers a perfect balance of complex carbohydrates, plant proteins, and healthy fats to fuel your day.

title: Paneer Tikka Masala
subtitle: with Basmati Rice & Naan
description: Our Paneer Tikka Masala features cubes of marinated and grilled Indian cottage cheese simmered in a rich, aromatic tomato-based sauce with traditional spices. Served with fragrant basmati rice and warm naan bread, this hearty dish offers the perfect balance of creaminess, spice, and texture. The house-made sauce blends garam masala, fenugreek, and other authentic spices for a truly memorable dining experience.

subtitle: with Vegetables & Mango
description: Our plant-based Poke Bowl features marinated smoked tofu cubes atop a bed of seasoned sushi rice, surrounded by fresh vegetables and tropical mango. subtitle: with Truffle Oil & Parmesan
